body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Hugh Levi and Sarah Hayden Levi. Married to Sarah Jane McLoney Levi in Harrison County, Kentucky, on September 3, 1856. Father of Hugh Marcus Levi, James A. Levi, Sarah A. Levi, Rebecca Levi, and George L. Levi. Resident of Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.
